sentence.Network_en: Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as "The Magnificent Seven".
sentence.Network_cn: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

sentence.Network_en: The seven major industrial countries will have their yearly meeting in London.
sentence.Network_cn: 7个主要工业国家将在伦敦举行一年一度的会议。

sentence.Network_en: McGregor's effort was enough to edge Johnson out of the top spot.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦格雷戈奋力一搏，成功地将约翰逊从第一的位置上挤了下来。
